page.title: 18Spare time
page.content: {What we do in our spare time at home: In my Dad's spare time he usually sits and reads for about an hour. Sometimes if he wants to, and if the weather is sunny, he might do some gardening or go for a walk but mostly he's indoors. My Mum is rather like my Dad but she likes to go out gardening and walking unlike my Dad. If it's raining she will drink a cup of tea or coffee. I like going out whatever the weather really but sometimes I stay in stamp collecting, drawing and making things. {A farmer's son writes: My Dad mostly reads the paper and watches tv. My Uncle's hobby is gardening and keeping old coins. My Mum's hobbies are keeping flowers and reading. My hobbies are making cows soft, watching swallows, riding my bike and mowing the lawn.
